snippet.title: Hermit and Pig - Official Trailer | Future of Play Direct 2023
snippet.description: Go on a journey in this quirky trailer for Hermit and Pig, an upcoming turn-based adventure RPG about a reclusive hermit and his truffle-hunting pig. These unlikely heroes must explore, forage, fight, and overcome unfortunate personal shortcomings to solve the mystery of a sinister corporate plot. Hermit and Pig will be available on PC.
